text: Bouguer may refer to: *Jean Bouguer (d. 1714), French hydrographer and mathematician *Pierre Bouguer (1698-1758), French mathematician, geophysicist, geodesist, and astronomer; son of Jean Bouguer *Bouguer (lunar crater), impact crater named after Pierre Bouguer *Bouguer (Martian crater), another impact crater named after Pierre Bouguer *8190 Bouguer, main-belt asteroid named after Pierre Bouguer
title: Bouguer
